answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestions. Please read our sticky note regarding upcoming trackers. A blood sugar/glucose tracker is in the works. We are also working on a food tracker (not detailed in the sticky note) and will let you know when they're available.Thanks,MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: Diabetes:Blood sugar levels such as "Morning fasting", "2 hours after Breakfast", "2 hours after Lunch", "2 hours after Dinner"Along with a Food/Beverage Consumption tracker (which should include what food and how much), this type of tracker could help any diabetic with an easy way to keep track without all those booklets and paper forms!
title: Suggestion for a Tracker
